title: The One Piece Podcast Episode 86 - Zach's Doughnut Theorem
author: The One Piece Podcast
description: The One Piece Podcast's coverage of Episode 443, discussing the formation of the ultimate team and the escalating prison break at Impel Down.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: May contain spoilers for the remainder of the Impel Down arc

title: One Piece – Impel Down Arc (Episodes 422 – 456) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the entire Impel Down arc including episode 443, analyzing the themes of unlikely alliances and the escalating tension as Luffy races against time to save Ace.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Impel Down arc

title: 443-444: The Ultimate Team Has Formed! Shaking Impel Down! and Even More Chaos! Here Comes Blackbeard Teach!
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A first-time viewer's reactions to episodes 443-444, expressing excitement about Crocodile's return and the formation of the powerful alliance. The blogger noted feeling like they 'won the plot lottery' with these episodes.

title: One Piece: Ivankov & Crocodile's Mysterious History, Theories Explained
author: CBR
description: An in-depth analysis of the mysterious relationship between Ivankov and Crocodile first hinted at in episode 443, exploring various fan theories about Crocodile's secret weakness.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains theories that reference later story developments

title: One Piece: The Impel Down Arc, Explained
author: Game Rant
description: A comprehensive guide to the Impel Down arc, including detailed analysis of episode 443's significance in forming the Ultimate Team and how this alliance changes the dynamics of the prison break.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Explains the entire Impel Down arc

title: Best Crocodile Moments in One Piece, Ranked
author: CBR
description: A ranking of Crocodile's best moments throughout One Piece, including his recruitment of Mr. 1 and formation of the alliance in episode 443.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers about Crocodile's appearances throughout the series
